entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
